content.raw:
I think `gzcoarse` is built even if it won't be run, it would be nice to change that.

It's strange that you'd not find GTS after installing Gazebo, since it is a dependency. Did you install Gazebo from debs or from source? Are you sure it was properly installed, can you run `gazebo`?

To install GTS, you could always run

~~~
sudo apt-get install libgts-dev
~~~
content.html:
I think gzcoarse is built even if it won't be run, it would be nice to change that.

It's strange that you'd not find GTS after installing Gazebo, since it is a dependency. Did you install Gazebo from debs or from source? Are you sure it was properly installed, can you run gazebo?

To install GTS, you could always run

sudo apt-get install libgts-dev
